scripts.unit: rm -rf output && abap_transpile && echo RUNNING && node output/index.mjs
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run downport && npm run unit
scripts.downport: rm -rf downport && cp -r src downport && abaplint --fix abaplint-downport.jsonc
scripts.proto: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o test/compiled.js proto/common.proto proto/resource.proto proto/trace.proto proto/logs.proto&& pbts -o test/compiled.d.ts test/compiled.js
